alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Isle of Wight and northeastern Southampton Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ivor, or near Wakefield, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Zuni around 815 PM EDT. Windsor around 835 PM EDT. Carrsville around 840 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Walters, Whitley, Collosse, Berlin, Indika and Burdette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
